headline: BVI appoints Jim Hollingshead as CEO
summary: Hollingshead, the former CEO of Insulet, will lead BVI as it uses a $1 billion financing to support its global eye care business.

raw.headline: BVI appoints Jim Hollingshead as CEO
raw.summary: Hollingshead, the former CEO of Insulet, will lead BVI as it uses a $1 billion financing to support its global eye care business.

headline: 1 Safe-and-Steady Stock with Impressive Fundamentals and 2 We Find Risky
summary: A stock with low volatility can be reassuring, but it doesn’t always mean strong long-term performance. Investors who prioritize stability may miss out on higher-reward opportunities elsewhere.

raw.headline: 1 Safe-and-Steady Stock with Impressive Fundamentals and 2 We Find Risky
